TopicTitle: XL rover wheels not turning / left clicking sometimes unresponsive.

Articles.Content:
Hello,

Has anyone ran into issues with the XL rover wheels not turning? Inside the right click menu the motor bar moves when I attempt to turn the wheels but other than that nothing happens. I've read a couple post that said to make sure they weren't crammed or hitting things but they are all in the open. The only factor I can think that could be causing this other than a bug or outdated mod is that they are moving a huge load. I don't know how big exactly but it's by far the largest I've ever moved. I'm also using the wheels at maximum scale. They move forward and in reverse fine just slowly but they don't even twitch when I try to turn them. 

 

I'm also having a pretty annoying issue when it comes to clicking. It doesn't always happen and I believe it's related to performance when I'm working on a massive design. If I switch out of build mode and go into position mode or rotate mode sometimes I have to click the part numerous times before it actually registers the click and displays the move or rotate menus. This is probably an out dated mod or my old pc but I thought I'd ask to see if it was something else.

 

Cheers

@Baronsthey dont "turn" they lower rpm on one side to "turn" like a tank

Edited May 9, 2018 by guesswho2778
